synopsis.text:
Looking to chase her dreams of becoming a track and field star, the spirited Hiyori Suzumi leaves her serene coastal hometown for the bustling metropolis of Tokyo. Enrolling in the prestigious Sakuragaoka High School, Hiyori's new life takes an unexpected turn when she stumbles upon a part-time job opportunity to support her living expenses. To her surprise, she finds herself working as an assistant manager for LIP×LIP, an up-and-coming male idol duo consisting of her very own classmates, Yuujirou Someya and Aizou Shibasaki.

As Hiyori navigates the challenges of balancing her academic life, track ambitions, and managing the idol group, she embarks on a journey of self-discovery and growth. Meanwhile, LIP×LIP's rising popularity adds to the thrill and pressure, as they captivate audiences with their electrifying performances. Witness the enchanting tale of Hiyori and LIP×LIP, as they each strive to make their dreams a reality in the dazzling world of school, sports, and stardom.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
